alert.note: Alert for Tusas Mountains Including Chama (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued December 14 at 2:02AM MST until December 15 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING THROUGH WEDNESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulations between 3 and 7 inches possible. Locally higher amounts possible above 9000 feet. Winds could gust as high as 50 mph. * WHERE...Tusas Mountains Including Chama. * WHEN...From this evening through Wednesday morning. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Tire traction will be reduced. Extend the distance between your vehicle and the vehicle in front of you. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.
